1.content: Research tailoring business requirements and feature analysis
1.details: Research comprehensive features needed for tailoring/boutique business: customer management, measurement tracking, order management, inventory, scheduling, accounting, reminder systems, trial scheduling, payment processing, etc. Analyze competitor solutions and industry best practices.

2.details: Request Supabase project credentials from user to set up backend database, authentication, and storage for the scalable application.

3.details: Create modern, professional design system for tailoring business app with responsive layouts for desktop, tablet, mobile. Include color schemes, typography, components for customer management, order tracking, scheduling interfaces.

4.content: Build full-stack Next.js application with all core features
4.details: Develop comprehensive tailoring management system including: Customer Management, Measurement Profiles, Order Tracking, Inventory Management, Scheduling System (trials, fittings, deliveries), Accounting & Billing, Reminder System, Payment Integration, Reporting Dashboard, Multi-tenant Architecture for scalability, PWA capabilities for offline functionality.

5.details: Deploy the application and provide documentation for scaling to thousands of users, adding new features, and maintaining the system.
